items.name: Legacy of Fury

40% chance when you Kill a Scorched Enemy to Burn Each surrounding

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.

properties.name: Warcry, AoE, Duration, Fire, Attack, Trigger, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, taunting nearby enemies to attack the user and exerting subsequent attacks. Covers enemies in ash, causing them to move slower and take increased fire damage. Affected enemies explode when they die, dealing fire damage in an area.

Counts total Power of Enemies in Range
